      • getScanDistance

        public static double getScanDistance()
        Returns the amount of pixels traveled before scanning for collision.
        Returns:
        The distance before checking collision.

      • setScanDistance

        public static void setScanDistance(double scanDistance)
        Sets the amount of pixels the object can fall before collision is checked again. Setting this value too small will result in poor performance, and setting it too high results in inaccurate collision and in some cases even clipping through platforms.
        Parameters:
        scanDistance - The amount of pixels to travel before checking collision.
